name: Area 52 Raid
description:
"Area 52 Raid" is a multiplayer horror game.

You play as a Character, who needs to pick up all documents.  The Player than needs to find a key for a closed room, that room contains a shoot gun. You will need it to kill the enemy.

 Features

  • Pixel filter
  • First-person shooting
  • A dangerous Monster
  • Multiplayer

The game is made in about one week.
